column5: I am looking for a good waterproof boat bag in the 40 L- 60 L  size , any ideas . Something like the yellow bass pro bags that everyone has but a bit better quality . I have seen a couple but can only get them in the states of course . Thanks

I have a variety of sizes of SealLines, more money but better than the Can Tire stuff or BPS stuff, lots of unexpected uses for these too  http://www.cascadedesigns.com/sealline   keeps everything dry even after an unexpected swim
Holy crap, did you take Theoren Fleury fishing?  Awesome!
Holy crap, did you take Theoren Fleury fishing?  Awesome!
You can buy good quality bags at MEC or Sojourn in Barrie(or order from MEC on-line)

http://drybags.com/mm5/merchant.mvc?Session_ID=b756e4d10998da4fffb3fd7fe43200b8&Screen=PROD&Store_Code=D&Product_Code=FGW-UDB&Category_Code=BoatBags  they have a good lineup, pricey but much better than the bps/cabelas versions, but very slow ship time, I think they're built to order
never noticed the resemblance before, but now that you mention it, pretty funny

Watershed bags are THE best out there imo. I've got a couple that I use for spring whitewater trips and they've never let me down. Bit more spendy than other brands but you get what you pay for. Roll down bags WILL leak if they see any amount of water so I don't use those for anything important.
